description: In Hawai‘i, ‘ohana isn’t just immediate family; an ‘ohana is a sanctuary of friends and family where you can just be yourself. With that in mind, we crafted the classic ‘Ohana, your go-to choice for simple everyday style. A water-resistant sandal with a smooth drop- in footbed for the perfect anatomical fit. The ‘Ohana makes your feet feel at home.
name: Olukai Ohana - Mens

specs.value: Water-resistant synthetic straps with quick-drying jersey knit lining and soft nylon toe post create an ultra-comfy fit
The compression-molded EVA midsole with a smooth drop-in ICEVA footbed provides an anatomical fit for all-day comfort
Non-marking rubber outsole with coral lug design for added grip
